name: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks (itch)
name_original: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks (itch)
description:
Story:

Two enemy assassins wind up lost in the snowy Gravehollow Peaks. Some say there's a beast hidden within the cave of the tallest peak, a beast that curses the mountains with eternal snow. Will they ever find a way out?

Play through this winter otome game to help Seth and Iris get out of Gravehollow Peaks! The choice is entirely yours.

  •  3 different endings.
  • Approximately an hour of gameplay.
  • 1 dashing love interest & 1 sketchy but lovable fairy-godmother
  • SFX and cinematic cut scenes

Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks is a submission for the 2021 Winter VN Jam. This is a side story based on the main game, Garden of Seif, which is currently in development.

Content Warning: Strong language, mild descriptions of violence, alcohol references

This is a work of fiction. Any similarity to actual persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental. All names, characters, locations, events, and cultures are purely from the author's imagination.
